text: Balo -- ''he allahâ€Œ! Samrajyera malika! Tumi yake iccha kara take samrajya pradana karo, abara yara kacha theke iccha kara rajatba chiniye na'o, ara yake khusi sam'manita karo, abara yake khusi apamanita karo, -- tomara hate'i rayeche kalyana. Nihsandeha tumi saba-kichura upare sarbasaktimana.
